data.actual_result: The popup box stays in the same position and disappears from view as the window gets smaller
data.expected_result: The popup box should move with the window
data.short_description: The user info popup box does not move when the window shrinks
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your Discord window can be resized by moving the shrinking cursor - Go to a server - In the member list, click on any user - The user info popup box should appear - Shrink the window horizontally from right to left - Observe the popup box
